```{r render-functions, include=FALSE}

render_pub_block <- function(df, block_title) {
  # Make sure year labels exist
  df <- df %>%
    mutate(
      year_label = ifelse(is.na(year), "Forthcoming", as.character(year)),
      year_sort  = ifelse(is.na(year), -Inf, year)
    ) %>%
    arrange(desc(year_sort), title)

  out <- character(0)

  # Block title
  out <- c(out, paste0(
    '<div class="research-block-title">',
    htmltools::htmlEscape(block_title),
    '</div>'
  ))

  # Loop years
  years <- unique(df$year_label)

  for (yl in years) {
    out <- c(out, paste0(
      '<div class="research-year">',
      htmltools::htmlEscape(yl),
      '</div>'
    ))

    # (Optional but recommended) year grid wrapper for consistent spacing
    out <- c(out, '<div class="pub-year-grid">')

    dfy <- df %>% filter(year_label == yl)

    for (i in seq_len(nrow(dfy))) {
      row <- dfy[i, ]

      # Title: link if url exists, else plain span (so styling is consistent)
      title_html <- if (!is.na(row$authoritative_url) && nzchar(row$authoritative_url)) {
        paste0(
          '<a href="', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$authoritative_url),
          '" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">',
          htmltools::htmlEscape(row$title),
          '</a>'
        )
      } else {
        paste0('<span>', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$title), '</span>')
      }

      # Image
      img_html <- if (!is.na(row$img) && nzchar(row$img)) {
        paste0(
          '<img class="pub-img" src="', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$img),
          '" alt="', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$venue), '" />'
        )
      } else {
        '<div class="pub-img" style="background: rgba(255,255,255,0.03);"></div>'
      }

      # Notes
      notes_html <- if (!is.na(row$notes) && nzchar(row$notes)) {
        paste0(
          '<div class="pub-meta" style="margin-top:0.4rem;">',
          htmltools::htmlEscape(row$notes),
          '</div>'
        )
      } else {
        ''
      }

      # Links (buttons)
      links <- character(0)

      if (!is.na(row$pdf_url) && nzchar(row$pdf_url)) {
        links <- c(links, paste0(
          '<a href="', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$pdf_url),
          '" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Link to pdf</a>'
        ))
      }

      if (!is.na(row$authoritative_url) && nzchar(row$authoritative_url)) {
        links <- c(links, paste0(
          '<a href="', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$authoritative_url),
          '" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Link to Journal</a>'
        ))
      }

      links_html <- if (length(links) > 0) {
        paste0('<div class="pub-links">', paste(links, collapse = ''), '</div>')
      } else {
        ''
      }

      # Card HTML — IMPORTANT: no leading indentation at line starts
      card_html <- paste0(
        '<div class="pub-card">', "\n",
          img_html, "\n",
          '<div>', "\n",
            '<div class="pub-meta">', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$authors), '</div>', "\n",
            '<div class="pub-title">', title_html, '</div>', "\n",
            '<div class="pub-journal">', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$venue), '</div>', "\n",
            notes_html, "\n",
            links_html, "\n",
          '</div>', "\n",
        '</div>'
      )

      out <- c(out, card_html)
    }

    out <- c(out, '</div>') # close .pub-year-grid
  }

  knitr::asis_output(paste(out, collapse = "\n"))
}

# (NEW) Simple list renderer for Press & media (no year grouping)
render_press_media <- function(df, block_title = "Press & media") {

  out <- character(0)

  out <- c(out, paste0(
    '<div class="research-block-title">',
    htmltools::htmlEscape(block_title),
    '</div>'
  ))

  # Simple list
  out <- c(out, '<ul class="press-list">')

  for (i in seq_len(nrow(df))) {
    row <- df[i, ]

    title_link <- if (!is.na(row$url) && nzchar(row$url)) {
      paste0(
        '<a href="', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$url),
        '" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">',
        htmltools::htmlEscape(row$title),
        '</a>'
      )
    } else {
      htmltools::htmlEscape(row$title)
    }

    meta_bits <- c()
    if (!is.na(row$outlet) && nzchar(row$outlet)) meta_bits <- c(meta_bits, htmltools::htmlEscape(row$outlet))
    if (!is.na(row$year) && nzchar(as.character(row$year))) meta_bits <- c(meta_bits, htmltools::htmlEscape(as.character(row$year)))
    meta <- if (length(meta_bits) > 0) paste(meta_bits, collapse = " · ") else ""

    notes <- if (!is.na(row$notes) && nzchar(row$notes)) {
      paste0(' <span class="press-notes">(', htmltools::htmlEscape(row$notes), ')</span>')
    } else ""

    out <- c(out, paste0(
      '<li class="press-item">',
        '<div class="press-title">', title_link, '</div>',
        if (nzchar(meta)) paste0('<div class="press-meta">', meta, notes, '</div>') else "",
      '</li>'
    ))
  }

  out <- c(out, '</ul>')

  knitr::asis_output(paste(out, collapse = "\n"))
}
```
